In three sentences
Comments
We have continual campus police who are always visible. We have call boxes all over campus for safety issues of any type. Very safe place to gain your education.
Greek Life is Awesome. They have groups for most all who would like to be a part. The community service they provide is second to none.
Variety of clubs, intramural sports, student government, and Greek life.
EKU is great for all types of students. They are not geared toward a particular group. There here for all.
Powell, the place for everyone to eat and have fun.
All colleges are expensive to some degree. However, if you are looking for a quality education EKU is the place for YOU.
You can take part in the Greek life, join an intramural, take part in dorm activities, as well as many other opportunities provided on campus. Oh yes, don't forget the Tailgating.
Dining has a lot of options for everyone. Even the very picky like me.
Awesome dorm life for those wishing to be a part of a sorority. There is always something going, as well as study time.
Students are held to a high standard and are challenged daily to do their best.
Come prepared to study and work hard. However, prepare to meet lots of new friends with lots of things to get involved in.
Awesome atmosphere for ALL students no matter what there interested in. Also beautiful campus that is easy to navigate.
pageTitle: Eastern Kentucky University (EKU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {297823=Eastern Kentucky University is a great school. I graduated in May 2012 and I am now going back for my second bachelor's degree from them. I love the opportunities afforded by EKU that come along with a small college atmosphere., 396605=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 282935=EKU is a great school, I transferred to EKU in August of 2012 to complete my bachelors degree and I am so glad I transferred when I did. I have completed a lot of my classes and have gotten extra certifications that I wouldn't have been able to at other schools and I feel that I am actually prepared for my career., 339489=I started here at EKU in Fall of 2013. I love the campus size, classroom sizes, teachers, and most importantly the students here as well. There will always be something to do on and off campus. You're not far from Lexington and Louisville, either. Everyone on campus is here to make sure you become successful. I plan on graduating from here. #ColonelPride, 108227=If you are looking to major in Education then EKU is the school for you. The major courses there are specifically designed to make you feel confident in all content areas. I am set to graduate in December of this year and I feel very satisfied with the education I have recieved.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot You learn a lot if you make it to every class and do all the readings required. It's tough, but anyone can do it. Get to know your teachers, they help more than you'd think. And they do understand what is happening with all the changes in our lives, don't be afraid to let them know what's going on! Login to rate or flag the reviews Chelsea from Richmond, KY 12/01/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 9 out of 11 people found this review useful. 3 of 97 Categories Comments Great for these types of students There are many different types of students here. We all just kinda mix together, it is the only place i have seen this in my life. I love that people don't judge you here. You can be who you are without worrying if someone will judge you.
